subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Philip Rivers led San Diego to scores on two of three drives, then Chargers Coach Norv Turner helped his team with two successful challenges in a series in a 20-7 preseason win over Tony Romo and the host Dallas Cowboys.
snippet: Philip Rivers led San Diego to scores on two of three drives, then Chargers Coach Norv Turner helped his team with two successful challenges in a series in a 20-7 preseason win over Tony Romo and the host Dallas Cowboys.
